title: Stores: Managing the Categories of a Store
body:
Stores: Managing the Categories of a Store¶


Each row has a category name and the number of products in the category.
To manage the categories of a store, you will need to have navigated to the store. Refer here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Click Categories

  2. Click to create a new category

    • Enter a category title

    • Click Save

  3. Click and Edit Category to edit the category title

  4. Click , Delete Category, and Yes to delete a category

    • The products in the deleted category (if it was the only selected category) will now only be seen when a customer views all the products unless you edit the product’s categories
